about_the_game:
Anatta is a 2.5D puzzle-platformer, sci-fi story. You play as a young girl waking up on a deserted beach without a clue how she ended up there. While exploring the island, you find an abandoned lighthouse and receive a distress signal — someone is trapped and desperately asking for help.

Overcome challenging obstacles, run, climb, jump, hide, interact with the environment, and solve unique puzzles to move forward. But be careful — danger lurks around every corner. Can you stay alive, uncover the dark secrets of the island, and figure out what is really going on?

Anatta offers not only old-school gameplay and a challenge to your wits but also an exploration of the philosophical question: What does it mean to be yourself?
detailed_description:

Overcome challenging obstacles, run, climb, jump, hide, interact with the environment, and solve unique puzzles to move forward. But be careful — danger lurks around every corner. Can you stay alive, uncover the dark secrets of the island, and figure out what is really going on?

Anatta offers not only old-school gameplay and a challenge to your wits but also an exploration of the philosophical question: What does it mean to be yourself?
name: Anatta

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 | RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are preliminary estimated minimum system requirements.

short_description: Imagine waking up on a deserted shore without a clue how you ended up there. Anatta is a puzzle-platformer that takes you deep into the mysteries of an enigmatic island. Discover its haunting past and carve your path to salvation.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Hungarian, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America
